sv.title: Select your vehicle
sv.toptxt: Please select age and mileage of your vehicle...
sv.mamop: Start to type the model description of your vehicle...
sv.bottomtxt: Select the Make and Model of your car to find matching vehicles in the next section.

svl.title: List of Vehicles
svl.toptxt: Please use the filters to narrow down the list or select your vehicle.
svl.found: vehicles were found with your criteria
svl.displayed: vehicles are displayed matching the filters
svl.noresults: There were no results found with your criteria - click here to reset the filters.
svl.errortxt: Please select a make and model and one of the vehicles in the list to proceed.

cv.title: Configure your vehicle
cv.toptxt: Please select the options your vehicle has fitted:
cv.bottomtxt: When completed, please press the next button or select the next step at the top of the screen.

cvi.title: Please identify yourself
cvi.toptxt: Please identify yourself with one of the below login options:
cvi.bottomtxt: Please click on one of the login options and follow the process.

svp.title: Your data
svp.toptxt: Please fill in your personal information:
svp.emailvtxt: Please enter here the code you have received by email...
svp.mobvtxt: Please enter here the code you have received by SMS...
svp.midtxt: For speeding up the process, we recommend you to using the above login options like Facebook, Google, Twitter, etc.
svp.sellpriceinfo: Please specify the price for which you would buy the vehicle you have specified. If we can organise this vehicle for you for the price given and you do not want to buy the vehicle anymore, we can charge a service fee of 10€ to you for our service.
svp.li1: That the company can share my personal details for the purpose of this particular vehicle with 3rd parties
svp.li2: That I will buy the vehicle for the price given
svp.li3: The Terms of Conditions of this service
svp.captcha: Verify that you are a person:
svp.captchatxt: Please confirm that you are not a robot by verifying this captcha.
svp.bottomtxt: Please fill in your personal details...
